Articles.Content: Accouding to the wiki gas planet 2 is being made (I mean it's colured green) I kind of find that hard to believe, also there's no "proof" link

As I understand it Gas Planet 2 was planned for inclusion in the game back when more planets was a new thing. At the time, NovaSilisko was part of the Squad dev team and was the one coming up with the planet designs (I think, might be wrong). He has since parted ways with Squad to pursue other endeavors and there hasn't been official word on whether it will still be added. SO maybe it wil come, maybe not, we'll have to wait and see.
What I mean is that does it need to be changed? From what you said it does
Who knows? It *was* planned, and we haven't heard anything contradicting those plans, so who can say?
